sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Insurance Data Security Law.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Insurance Data Security Law.

sections.heading: Definitions. As used in this Act:
sections.text: Definitions. As used in this Act:

sections.heading: Penalties. In the case of a violation of this Act, a licensee may be penalized in accordance with the provisions of the Illinois Insurance Code, including Section 403A of the Illinois Insurance Code
sections.text: Penalties. In the case of a violation of this Act, a licensee may be penalized in accordance with the provisions of the Illinois Insurance Code, including Section 403A of the Illinois Insurance Code.

sections.heading: Rules. The Department may, in accordance with the Illinois Administrative Procedure Act and Section 401 of the Illinois Insurance Code, adopt such rules as shall be necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act
sections.text: Rules. The Department may, in accordance with the Illinois Administrative Procedure Act and Section 401 of the Illinois Insurance Code, adopt such rules as shall be necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act.

sections.heading: Severability. If any provision of this Act or its application to any person or circumstance is held invalid, the invalidity of that provision or application does not affect other provisions or applications of this Act that can be given effect without the invalid provision or application
sections.text: Severability. If any provision of this Act or its application to any person or circumstance is held invalid, the invalidity of that provision or application does not affect other provisions or applications of this Act that can be given effect without the invalid provision or application.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect January 1, 2024.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect January 1, 2024.
